title: About us
label: Who we are?
summary: Our office has been active in the field of Real Estate in the wider area of the Aristotle Municipality since 2006. The specialized knowledge and the many years of experience of our partners are the elements that distinguish us and make our business one of the most reliable and renowned in the field of Real Estate. Our company consists of more than 10 associates, well-trained, full of appetite and enthusiasm for the subject.
address: Real Estate Likaki Chrisa, Ouranoupoli of Chalkidiki
